About_me: I joined Shell as an Electrical Engineering Graduate at Shell Technology Centre Bangalore.  I have completed my integrated B.Tech and M.Tech program in Electrical Engineering with a specialization in Instrumentation and Signal Processing from IIT Kharagpur.
Ask_me_about: SKM Power Tools and Construction & Execution
Name: Doe, Jane 30
Role_Description_1: Responsible for execution of Electrical Plant Changes by working closely with Maintenance, Operations and other disciplines in Engineering team to carry out planning, construction and commissioning.
Role_Description_2: Supervised electrical construction and planned for arranging the temporary construction power . Also, supervised the EHT cable installation, testing and inspection.
Role_Description_3: To define the Basis of Design for the electrical system of FCP Sulphur Solution Project. The deliverables included the electrical load list, key Single line diagram, equipment summary sheet and the BFD document
